level.heading: Judicial review.
level.text: Any person who is aggrieved by the results of a hearing held by the Mayor pursuant to this subchapter shall have a right to judicial review in accordance with ยง 2-510.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-108
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-108, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 44-1001.01.
